thread.title: FIFA President Expresses Solidarity With Qatar

author: MENAFN
title: FIFA President Expresses Solidarity With Qatar
text:
FIFA President Expresses Solidarity With Qatar
MENAFN- The Peninsula) QNA
Zurich: FIFA President Gianni Infantino has expressed his full solidarity with Qatar following the Israeli attack that targeted residential compounds housing several leaders of Hamas in Doha. FIFA President said,“My thoughts and sympathies are with Qatar and the innocent people of Qatar who have been impacted by today's events.”
